website_summaries.verdict: Easy to read baby bath thermometer that lights up and doubles as a bath toy.
pros: Has alarm for too hot or too cold
Floats on top of the water
cons: The red light on this is a little small
The read time is a little slower than some others on the market

customer_reviews.title: Takes the guess work out of bath time
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this with my newborn for 3months now. Still works great every time. Keeps me at ease knowing the temperature isn’t too hot and lets me know when it’s starting to get too cold. Keeps mom and dad from arguing about if it’s too hot or too cold. It’s nice and small enough ito fit into a baby bath tub without taking up too much room and has a fun design I’m sure he’ll love playing with soon! It’s also small enough to travel with, I just stick it in out diaper bag when we go to grandmas so we can take baths there too with this worry saving tool.
customer_reviews.author: Owlgig

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my bearded dragon
customer_reviews.text: After getting a young bearded dragon, we knew water temp was VERY important during bath time. Not only did we need to make sure that the water was not too hot, but more importantly we needed to maintain a certain temp during bath time to make sure the water did not get too cold. This thermometer was PERFECT and we always throw it in the tub during bath time! Plus it's an extra toy for him to play with! You can see in the picture it tells us exactly when the water gets "cold" and it's time for him to come out. It will also give a warning when the temp is too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Richmond Ruff House

customer_reviews.title: first time moms need this
customer_reviews.text: It has made my life easier. You may think that it's easy to tell whether the water you will be using for the baby has the perfect temperature just by touching the water. But, when you are sleeping 3 to 4 hours a day, this little fellow comes in handy. I rather have the water at 98 degrees for sure using the thermometer instead of making a mistake because I feel like a zombie.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalia Rohr

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, cute, accurate!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best bath thermometer ever. For those with infants, this is smaller than a deck of cards, so it WILL fit in those little baby bath tubs no problem! It came with a battery and worked right out of the box. I didn't have to push buttons or configure it or do any extra work. I literally unwrapped it and it registered the temperature of my hand. Amazing!! It reads temperatures very quickly. Almost instant, but does have about a 2 second lag. I give it 10 stars. This is an amazing product (and super cute!).
customer_reviews.author: Texas_attitude

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: Worked for one bath. A complete waste of a product. We got it to replace the skip hop bath thermometer that we loved and this time I let my toddler pick out the animal and was excited when I found the stingray he requested. Learned my lesson and will just buy from a company that we know next time.
customer_reviews.author: Rach W BTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I wavered after reading reviews about it not working for long. But I bought it anyway. So glad I did. I used a sink tub with a thermometer for my daughter for a long time and when it was time to switch to the big tub I was worried about the water temp. This was the perfect solution. It updates the temp every few seconds so it’s not an instant read but as long as you keep an eye on it and adjust as you go it is awesome. I’ve had mine now for a few months and it still works just as well as day 1. Love it. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Works for a while
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for a while. My kids love it. We have had it about a year and all of a sudden it started reading hot. This is a picture of my kids bathwater. It was reading 114, of course there is no way it was that hot, I would be surprised if it was even 100.
customer_reviews.author: A Brown

customer_reviews.title: Bath time
customer_reviews.text: It works great and it’s really cute. Easy to use just shake it to wake it up (turn it on) and place it on the water and its easy to read! I got it to monitor my bath temperature (since I like it hot) as well as when my son takes a bath (so it’s not too hot)
customer_reviews.author: Smiget

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical when I took this out of the box. The plug that holds the battery did not appear to be water tight, but I dropped it in the tub and, so far, it's held up for a few baths. Seems to read the temperature accurately and a little red light pops up when the water is too hot. Very light weight and compact.
customer_reviews.author: AGonzales7

customer_reviews.title: Small, nice color
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight & smaller than expected. Space between dial and green part yhat allowed water inside. Maybe it was just mine.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Love the continuous temperature reading
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. I wish it was made from non-toxic silicon because my child likes to teethe on it in the bath, but oh well. It works great and I love that it reads the temperature every three seconds.
customer_reviews.author: persianlover

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: It is a gadget every parent should have. It makes bath time much easier and safe. I just place it in the tube when I'm filling the water and it instantly measures the temperature. It takes seconds to get an accurate temperature of the water, and the light brights red if too it's hot
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Baby Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermometer. It’s the best one I’ve encountered so far. Not only is it cute, it’s easy to use. I feel more comfortable using a digital reader like this which feels more accurate than the floating duck that changes color but doesn’t tell you the exact temp. This has been a great purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Very useful, especially during winter months
customer_reviews.text: We love it and it's an absolute must for every baby. Before having it, the bathing water for the baby was cool, although acceptable. She didn't like cool water and cried. Once we got this thermometer, we poured hotter water and our baby liked it better and didn't cry. The instructions were helpful and we always use this thermometer when giving a bath.
customer_reviews.author: Nina M

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this thermometer for my baby’s bath. So easy to use and takes the anxiety out of having the bath too hot. I don’t usually write reviews but I was using it tonight and was thinking to myself how helpful it’s been!
customer_reviews.author: BreckGirl

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for long
customer_reviews.text: This worked initially, and then stopped working 6 weeks later. The bath water can be scalding hot and it will read that it's too cold. Not worth your money. (And it's also too late to return).
customer_reviews.author: Katie22

customer_reviews.title: Takes away the guessing!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. I was very nervous giving my son his first bath because of the water temperature. We then found this product and it works great and takes away all the temperature guessing! Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermometer!! Friends of mine got me a little rubber duck that has a blue disk on the bottom, when the water is too hot there is a white Hot, unfortunately even without water it's there. I needed something that was more accurate. I have had this since July and it is still running great! I love that it tells you if the water is too hot or too cold and that it gives an actual reading.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon I.

customer_reviews.title: And so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Been working perfectly for about 3 weeks now. Seriously so important for bath time. And so easy to use! Love the peace of mind that my baby’s bath temp is perfect. Must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: You won’t need a ugly faucet thermometer
customer_reviews.text: This is cute and useful we had a larger faucet where we couldn’t get the thermometer that fits directly on the faucet but this was a good solution works great and we don’t have to keep a large thermometer on the faucet! And you can always throw it in the sink to check the water temp:)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ward

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty good, I wish it would have a color indicator when the temperature was too cold as well as in the acceptable range, and not just when it was too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Super Saiyan Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use once I figured out you have to shake it to turn it on. Had it for a couple months. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B.

customer_reviews.title: Instant temp, works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome thermometer. It gives an instant temp reading even out of the water. No waiting to see what it says. Has easy to read “hot” and “cold” when it’s outside of the safe range for baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after using twice
customer_reviews.text: I’m a first time mom - so this product seemed very reassuring to me. Sadly it worked twice and then just stopped working. It won’t work or turn on at all. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pilar824

customer_reviews.title: I’d recommend and I’d buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Takes a little time and it very touchy, changes quickly every time my son touches it. But overall, I’d recommend and I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: KenjiAnn

customer_reviews.title: Great (and cute) product
customer_reviews.text: For now, I’ve been using this thermometer so I can take baths pregnant with peace of mind that it’s not too hot. It’s been great! I can’t wait to use it with my babies when they’re born!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work as advertised. Used 2 times so far, ...
customer_reviews.text: Work as advertised. Used 2 times so far, I checked the room temp/water temp with a temp gun and compared to this. The temp is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Alan B

customer_reviews.title: Great for newborns.
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for helping me find the perfect temperature before filling my baby's bathtub. Great product; floats on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Vibaisel

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Quick temp reader. Would be nice if it lit up green, blue, & red like other bath thermometers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn’t last long but fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great thermometer for keeping my bath the right temperature during pregnancy
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I liked it for the 2 months I had it and then it stopped working. Even tried new battery because I couldn't believe it. It was awesome until it stopped.
customer_reviews.author: Damon King

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever! My husband and I can never agree on the water temperature for the baby so this makes it easy!
customer_reviews.author: Angie8010

customer_reviews.title: My son seems to enjoy bath time a little more since using this bath ...
customer_reviews.text: My son seems to enjoy bath time a little more since using this bath thermometer! The size is perfect for his little hands to play with and the color is bright and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it’s supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Fool proof little device. Absolutely nothing to complain about - does exactly what it’s supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is great. Just give it a shake and drop it in the water. If the water gets too hot, it alerts you and blinks red. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Muppetjenny

customer_reviews.title: Celsius vs farenheit
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the product except I asked for one in Celsius. The current one supplied is Fahrenheit and I don’t know how to change it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works great and baby loves to play with it and gum on it. Perfect for babies! Very cute design.
customer_reviews.author: Christina G.

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: It leaked after 3 uses and now it doesn't work correctly. I never opened the battery compartment, so that's with the factory seal. Now, it only comes on sometimes and part of the screen doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and does the job
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, I've been using it for over 3 month, I've had no problems thus far. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby bathtub
customer_reviews.text: Best bath time Thermometer for baby bathtub. Helps a tired parent draw the perfect bath for baby.
customer_reviews.author: Laurren

customer_reviews.title: very functional, this thermometer is very cute,
customer_reviews.text: very functional, this thermometer is very cute, and it can float on water, my kid loves playing with it when take the bath.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCust

customer_reviews.title: Cute - kids love the color
customer_reviews.text: Great to have exact bath water temperature and kids love to play with it in the bath! Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick T.

customer_reviews.title: Baby safety
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can be sure the water is the right tempature for baby.
customer_reviews.author: Mo.Re

customer_reviews.title: Greath quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and temperature seems very accurate. Very pleased with the design and product.
customer_reviews.author: Nil P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what we wanted an easy to read, visually quick thermometer. Works great too!
customer_reviews.author: Lise A

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for getting back to me the shaking wakes it up
customer_reviews.author: G. Brockway

customer_reviews.title: Neat design didn’t work long
customer_reviews.text: Only used a few times and it’s already stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Tmiles

customer_reviews.title: This thermometer is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is easy to use, and a fun addition to bath time. I highly recommend this product. Great price, along with fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Albertine A. K. Turner

customer_reviews.title: It worked for a little and now stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product but it stopped working after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan Doak

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It no longer works and we’ve only had it for a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't give you temperature instantly
customer_reviews.text: Cute looking thermostat, but very slow in reading the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: MI RAE PARK

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, just not super high on the convenience scale.
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is cute, but kind of hard to read. I’ve had others that have red, green and yellow lights for too hot, just right and too cold temps that are much more convenient for a quick look to see what range you are in. This one has a red light, it says, but it is very small and I have never seen it come on. It works fine, just maybe not as convenient as some others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally...does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several different products to monitor the temp of my son’s (now a toddler) baths, and this is the first thing to actually work and provide value. I needed something that I could put in the tub and watch as I filled it because we use the shower head with a filter (versus the tub spout, for which our temp cover no longer serves a purpose). Great buy! Accurate, easy to store between baths, and I like that we can replace battery down the line to keep using.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. No complaints here. Had it for a few wks now and it hasn’t died on us like those other ones. We wouldn’t know any better if it was accurate or not though. Battery was included and it’s been on and working thus far. All you have to do is shake it or move it a bit and it turns on. We usually have the temp around 99-100 degree (F).
customer_reviews.author: Raul Hang Morgan MDO

customer_reviews.title: Good but not 100% accurate
customer_reviews.text: I tested this and it reads a few degrees cooler than the water actually is per my thermopen. When the water is 100 degrees this usually measures 98 but I still use it everytime to get a general idea if it's too hot or cold. I find the reading gets more accurate the longer it sits in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very useful but it takes time to show a stable temp
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day but I would have love that it had a switch for Celcius. I don’t know if it really is accurate and it changes a lot the temperatures when I put it in the water, so you have to wait a couple of minutes so it shows a stable temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Camila Tagle

customer_reviews.title: Easy of use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our granddaughter, her parents were very nervous about giving her a bath cause they wanted to make sure the bath temp would be correct. We bought them a couple different ones, but this one was by far the best one out of the other 3. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dwakka

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and useful
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says! My baby stays comfortable in the water from the beginning to the end of her bath without getting too hot or too cold. Easy to use, just shake it a little and place it in the water. It floats and stays on throughout the bath. Also, it’s super cute. Always makes me smile.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon

customer_reviews.title: I actually purchased this to use as a pool thermometer ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this to use as a pool thermometer. So cute and after 3 weeks in the hot AZ weather no issues.
customer_reviews.author: AZlady77

customer_reviews.title: works great. It beeps if the water is too hot
customer_reviews.text: Cute, works great. It beeps if the water is too hot. My other different thermometer broke after like 4mo and this one still works great!
customer_reviews.author: H. M.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well, have used it a handful of times so far and it works as advertised. It’s cute. I’ve even dropped it by accident and it still works. Seems accurate but haven’t tested it against anything.
customer_reviews.author: H. Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Good value & quality
customer_reviews.text: This is cute and works well. I like the way it floats around in the water like a toy. It also flashes if the water is within the too hot or cold range.
customer_reviews.author: dresden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We use this with every bath!!! This is such a god send and easy to use!!! No guesswork with temperature for baby!!! Super cute design. We even used it to see how the outside pool was to make sure it wasn't too too cold for her! :)
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: It’s good when it works, but doesn’t always display
customer_reviews.text: When it works it’s great, but sometimes it doesn’t work. I haven’t figured out why. I try submerging, keeping afloat etc just sometimes it works sometimes it diesnt
customer_reviews.author: terp410

customer_reviews.title: Worked when it came out of the box. Went ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked when it came out of the box. Went to use it a few days later in the tub, for the first time, and was out of luck because it was already dead. No nothing from it. msy as well thrown my money down th drain.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Not just an adorable toy.
customer_reviews.text: Adorbs. Works great and temp is spot-on when I compared with my standard thermometer. It flashes red when too hot, which is sweet.
customer_reviews.author: David Onley

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, very cute
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for determining the the bath is the right temperature. Looks so much like a toy, though, that my two year-old has carried it away and I haven’t seen it in a while. Adorable, but maybe too adorable...?
customer_reviews.author: Kikitastrophe

customer_reviews.title: Takes a while to take temperature
customer_reviews.text: Does it’s job but I knocked off one star because it can take a while to get the temperature reading, which feels like forever when you have an infant!
customer_reviews.author: B.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, fun and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little thing. It’s cute and it let’s us know at a glance whether the water in baby’s bath is at the sweet spot he prefers.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Prescott

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Turns on when you move or shake it. Turns off when at rest. Works like a charm. I keep in my hot tub. And its fun too.
customer_reviews.author: Star Bo

customer_reviews.title: Works great and super handy!
customer_reviews.text: So far, after 5 months of use, I have had no issues and it seems to be reading accurately. It's cute and compact as well... I would recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristan R.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good bath time thermometer. I had a blue whale that was faster read time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Zayas

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work intermittently. Am I not using this thermometer correctly?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: Love this for baby bath time. Super easy to use and fun floating around the tub!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: She said that was perfect temperature. As a test I raised the temp ...
customer_reviews.text: Must have for the elderly. I tested this on grandma's bath water. The first few baths I made at the same chosen degrees. She said that was perfect temperature. As a test I raised the temp one degree and she noticed the difference. So after a dozen baths I would say this is a must have. The device registers very fast, however the first check I wait one minute under water to get an accurate first reading
customer_reviews.author: Sean McDonnell

product_meta.title: Baby Bath Thermometer with Room Thermometer - Famidoc FDTH-V0-22 NEW Upgraded Sensor Technology for Baby Health Bath Tub Thermometer Floating Toy Thermometer (Green)
feature_bullets: ✅ Easy to use , baby bath thermometer: No on-off button, Activates automatically by shaking it on your hand.
✅ Waterproof, every 5 seconds to quickly and accurately update the bath water temperature and displays it in Fahrenheit on an easy-to-read LCD screen.
✅ High and low temperature alarm, LCD displays “COLD” for low temperature and “HOT” with red LED light flashing for high temperature, gives baby more care and makes baby a happy bath
✅ A safe and funny baby bathroom thermometer, baby bath tub toy, also a good baby gift

✅ Safe and harmless built-in battery, at least 1 year battery lifespan. Note: When the number display is incomplete or dark screen, please replace the battery. If you do not use the battery for a long time, please remove the battery.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars128 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
